Features.Name: Camera
Features.Positive characteristics: Top notch video and camera quality, photos turn out phenomenal, stable videos

Features.Name: Speakers
Features.Positive characteristics: Speakers pack a punch, high-quality sound

Features.Name: Packaging
Features.Positive characteristics: Great saving on price compared to other outlets

Features.Name: Overall performance
Features.Positive characteristics: Great upgrade from previous models, fast
Features.Negative characteristics: Phone constantly lags, slow to respond to commands, frequently turns on and off by itself, touch screen is unresponsive, gets warm easily

Features.Name: Photo quality
Features.Negative characteristics: Poor photo quality compared to previous models
